title: Workshop on Designing and Utilizing Information Literacy Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval methods and understanding of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: A practice-based learning environment for pre-service teachers, focusing on real-world applications of information literacy assessment tools

learning_goals: Explain the components of information literacy assessment tools (knowledge, practice, and disposition) categorized into seven domains
Analyze and adapt PILS (Perception of Information Literacy Scale)-based assessment items for educational contexts
Diagnose learners' information literacy levels and propose improvement strategies using validated assessment tools with established reliability and validity

resources: PDF document on validated information literacy assessment tools
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
